trainer.headline: My goal is to make everyone understand the true meaning of development with real time practical scenarios.
trainer.biography: Hello everyone, I am Ravikant Tyagi and I do have experience of 8+ years in IT as a developer and trainer. I have more than 100 websites live on internet and I have taught thousands of students, teachers & developers to learn to code and how to become professional developer with 100% practical knowledge.

courses.title: Supervised Deep Learning with ANN, CNN & RNN
courses.subTitle: Learn Deep Learning from scratch using Python and implement 5 Case Studies
courses.deion:
Welcome to the course of supervised deep learning from scratch using Python Programming with Tensorflow Framework. In this course you will learn to build 5 case studies that includes images and text processing.

In this course you are going to learn ANN and its maths and that to implemented using Python from scratch using numpy only.

Then you will learn to implement ANN with Tensorflow along with some case studies to get started with. Topics that we are going to cover:

ANN - Artificial Neural Network

  • Feedforward and Backpropagation
  • Implementing ANN from Scratch
  • Machine Learning vs Deep Learning Comparison

Introduction to Tensorflow

CNN - Convolutional Neural Network

  • Understanding CNNÂ 
  • CNN Implementation using Tensoflow
  • CNN Case Study Traffic Sign Classification
  • Model Optimization
  • Gradient Tape

RNN

  • Introduction to RNN
  • RNN Maths
  • Addition to 2 Binary Numbers using RNN
  • Introduction to LSTM
  • Sentiment Analysis using LSTM

RNN Case Study
objectives: Learn Deep Learning using Python from Scratch
Build 5 case studies with images and text datasets
targetAudience: Anyone with basic knowledge of Python and Machine Learning
Students, Developers or Faculty members who wants to get started in Deep Learning from zero level

courses.title: Complete UI Development for Beginners to Expert
courses.subTitle: Learn HTML 4, HTML 5, CSS 2, CSS 3 and Bootstrap with real time examples like Flipkart and Healthkart
courses.deion:
This is the course that every beginner, fresher or experienced can try to learn UI from scratch. This course contains HTML 4, CSS 2, HTML 5, CSS 3 and Bootstrap tutorials based on W3C Standards. After this course you will be able to understand how to build a webiste UI from scratch. This course includes replicas of websites like Flipkart, Healthkart and Other Online Shopping Application.

HTML Topics that are covered

  • HTML Basic Tags
  • Inline and Block Tags
  • List, Tables
  • Form Handling in HTML 4 and HTML 5
  • Semantics of HTML 5

CSS Topics that are covered

  • Ways to Use CSS
  • Selectors in CSS 2 and CSS 3
  • Borders and Backgrounds
  • Parallax Effect Using CSS Only
  • Box Models
  • Text Formatting
  • Font Awesome and Google Fonts
  • Alignment Using Float, Flex, Grid
  • Clearfix Hack
  • 2D and 3D Transformation and Animations
  • Positions
  • Display
  • RWD using Media Queries

Bootstrap

  • Containers and Grid System
  • Components and much more
prerequisites: Just VS Code for writing HTML and CSS
objectives: You will be able to understand W3C Standards of HTML and CSS
You will be able to build replicas of websites like Flipkart and Healthkart using CSS 2
How to build a website UI from scratch
Complete Responsive UI using HTML 5 and CSS 3
targetAudience: Designers who wants to add HTML and CSS as skill in there resume
